properties.description: Update or insert budget mapping for source text and move source to archive

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	process_name as string
}
source(output(
		View_Name as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Category as string,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item_Index as integer '000',
		Item as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Description as string,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		Insert_datetime as timestamp 'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm',
		Update_datetime as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MappingText
AuditFields alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
MappingText derive(Update_Time = fromUTC(currentTimestamp(),'Australia/Sydney'),
		Process_Name = $process_name) ~> AuditFields
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		View_Name as string,
		Category as string,
		process_name as string,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Item_Index as integer,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		CPM_Description as string,
		update_datetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['View_Name','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		GL_Desc = Description,
		View_Name,
		Category,
		process_name = AuditFields@Process_Name,
		Sub_Category,
		Item,
		Category_Index,
		Sub_Category_Index,
		Item_Index,
		CF_Code,
		CF_Description,
		CPM_Code,
		update_datetime = Update_Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> COAViews
